statements: SELECT * FROM packaging_defects;
SELECT defect_type, quality_rating FROM packaging_defects WHERE quality_rating > 3;
SELECT defect_location FROM packaging_defects WHERE defect_type = 'Crack';
SELECT id, date_recorded FROM packaging_defects ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_defects WHERE defect_location LIKE '%North%';
SELECT id, defect_type, date_recorded FROM packaging_defects WHERE quality_rating > 3 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT defect_type, defect_location, quality_rating FROM packaging_defects ORDER BY quality_rating ASC, date_recorded DESC;
SELECT id, defect_type, defect_location, quality_rating FROM packaging_defects WHERE defect_type LIKE 'Scratch%' OR defect_type LIKE 'Crack%' ORDER BY quality_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_defects WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date_recorded ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT id, defect_location, quality_rating FROM packaging_defects WHERE quality_rating < 4 AND defect_location NOT LIKE 'Warehouse%' ORDER BY defect_location ASC, quality_rating DESC, date_recorded ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_defects
SELECT date, location FROM packaging_defects
SELECT defect_type, severity FROM packaging_defects WHERE severity > 2
SELECT * FROM defect_patterns
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM defect_patterns
SELECT * FROM packaging_defects WHERE severity > 3 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) as total_defects FROM packaging_defects GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_defects DESC;
SELECT defect_type, COUNT(*) as num_defects FROM packaging_defects WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY defect_type HAVING num_defects > 5 ORDER BY num_defects DESC;

SELECT packaging_defects.id, packaging_defects.defect_type, defect_patterns.pattern_description FROM packaging_defects LEFT JOIN defect_patterns ON packaging_defects.defect_type = defect_patterns.relevant_defect_types;
SELECT location, SUM(severity) as total_severity FROM packaging_defects GROUP BY location HAVING total_severity > 10 ORDER BY total_severity DESC;
SELECT * FROM defects WHERE defect_type = 'Cosmetic'
SELECT defect_id, defect_type FROM defects WHERE defect_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, shelf_life_days FROM products WHERE product_type = 'Electronic'
SELECT inspection_id, inspection_date, inspector_name FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM defects;
SELECT defect_id, defect_type, defect_description FROM defects WHERE defect_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_type, shelf_life_days FROM products WHERE production_date <= '2022-03-15';
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_name, inspection_result FROM inspections WHERE defect_id IS NOT NULL AND product_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT defect_description, defect_type FROM defects WHERE defect_type = 'Critical' AND defect_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM defects;
SELECT defect_name, defect_type FROM defects WHERE defect_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM products WHERE product_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM defects WHERE defect_type = 'Mechanical';
SELECT defect_id, defect_name FROM defects WHERE defect_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturing_date FROM products WHERE product_type = 'Electronics' ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' OR country = 'Germany';

SELECT inspections.inspection_id, products.product_name, locations.location_name, defects.defect_name FROM inspections INNER JOIN products ON inspections.product_id = products.product_id INNER JOIN locations ON inspections.location_id = locations.location_id INNER JOIN defects ON inspections.defect_id = defects.defect_id WHERE inspections.is_defective = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM packaging_defects ORDER BY defect_type ASC;
SELECT defect_id, defect_description FROM packaging_defects WHERE defect_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY defect_id DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, defect_id, analysis_timestamp FROM defect_analysis WHERE defect_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM defect_patterns WHERE pattern_count > 100 ORDER BY pattern_count DESC;
SELECT record_id, line_id, inspector_name FROM inspection_records WHERE inspection_date = '2022-03-15' ORDER BY inspector_name;
SELECT * FROM packaging_defects WHERE defect_type = 'Crushed' ORDER BY defect_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT defect_id, defect_type, defect_description FROM packaging_defects INNER JOIN defect_analysis ON packaging_defects.defect_id = defect_analysis.defect_id WHERE defect_analysis.analysis_notes LIKE '%pattern%'

SELECT line_id, line_name, line_description, inspection_date FROM production_line INNER JOIN inspection_records ON production_line.line_id = inspection_records.line_id ORDER BY inspection_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM defect_patterns WHERE pattern_count > 100 ORDER BY pattern_name ASC, pattern_count DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT record_id, line_name, inspection_date, defect_type, inspector_name FROM inspection_records INNER JOIN production_line ON inspection_records.line_id = production_line.line_id INNER JOIN packaging_defects ON inspection_records.defect_id = packaging_defects.defect_id WHERE defect_type != 'Scratched' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 5
